title: Increased income decreases D for inferior bologna

content.question: If bologna is an inferior good, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The demand curve for bologna is vertical.
The demand curve for bologna is horizontal.
An increase in the price of bologna will decrease the supply of bologna.
An increase in consumer income will decrease the demand of bologna.
A decrease in consumer income will decrease the supply of bologna.

content.answer: An increase in consumer income will decrease the demand of bologna.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
